headline: Buy Now
abstract: In “Billion Dollar Brand Club,” Lawrence Ingrassia traces the rise of the direct-to-consumer revolution.
lead_paragraph: BILLION DOLLAR BRAND CLUBHow Dollar Shave Club, Warby Parker and Other Disruptors Are Remaking What We BuyBy Lawrence Ingrassia
keywords: Billion Dollar Brand Club: How Dollar Shave Club, Warby Parker, and Other Disruptors Are Remaking What We Buy (Book)
